item.description:
Hi all!

Here's the updated invite for this week's bully meet-up.

We'll be meeting at Green Hill Park in Worcester which is located on Green Hill Parkway right off of Lincoln Street. After you enter the park, drive about a quarter of a mile, and you'll see a parking lot on the right. Park there, cross the street and go to the wooden gazebo-type building.

Please be advised that this not a fenced-in off-leash area, so please remember to bring your pup's leash/harness. If you get lost or can't find us, you can call me at 508-265-5069.

For directions:

http://www.mapquest.c...

Hope to see you all there!!

- Kathleen

group.name: The Worcester English Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: June meet-up
